mn143:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn143:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
mn143:2.2_0: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati aññataraṁ purisaṁ āmantesi:
mn143:2.3_3: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhi:
mn143:2.6_1: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena āyasmato sāriputtassa pāde sirasā vandāhi:
mn143:2.8_0: So āyasmato sāriputtassa pāde sirasā vandatī’ti.
mn143:2.10_1: āyasmā sāriputto yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā’”ti.
mn143:2.11_1: bhante”ti kho so puriso anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn143:2.11_3: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so puriso bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn143:2.14_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
mn143:2.14_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so puriso āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
mn143:2.16_0: So āyasmato sāriputtassa pāde sirasā vandati;
mn143:2.18_1: āyasmā sāriputto yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā’”ti.
mn143:3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya āyasmatā ānandena pacchāsamaṇena yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
mn143:3.1_2: Nisajja kho āyasmā sāriputto anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ etadavoca:
mn143:4.2_2: balavā puriso tiṇhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya;
mn143:4.4_2: balavā puriso daḷhena varattakhaṇḍena sīse sīsaveṭhaṁ dadeyya;
mn143:4.6_2: dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā tiṇhena govikantanena kucchiṁ parikanteyya;
mn143:4.8_2: dve balavanto purisā dubbalataraṁ purisaṁ nānābāhāsu gahetvā aṅgārakāsuyā santāpeyyuṁ,
mn143:5.2_0: ‘na cakkhuṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me cakkhunissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:5.5_0: ‘na sotaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me sotanissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:5.8_0: ‘na ghānaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me ghānanissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:5.11_0: ‘na jivhaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me jivhānissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:5.14_0: ‘na kāyaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me kāyanissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:5.17_0: ‘na manaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me manonissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:6.2_0: ‘na rūpaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me rūpanissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:6.9_0: na dhammaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me dhammanissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:7.2_0: ‘na cakkhuviññāṇaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me cakkhuviññāṇanissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:7.9_0: na manoviññāṇaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me manoviññāṇanissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:8.2_0: ‘na cakkhusamphassaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me cakkhusamphassanissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:8.9_0: na manosamphassaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me manosamphassanissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:9.2_1: na ca me cakkhusamphassajāvedanānissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:9.9_1: na ca me manosamphassajāvedanānissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:10.2_0: ‘na pathavīdhātuṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me pathavīdhātunissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:10.9_0: na viññāṇadhātuṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me viññāṇadhātunissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:11.2_0: ‘na rūpaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me rūpanissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:11.8_0: na viññāṇaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me viññāṇanissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:12.2_0: ‘na ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me ākāsānañcāyatananissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:12.7_1: na ca me nevasaññānāsaññāyatananissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:13.2_0: ‘na idhalokaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me idhalokanissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:14.2_0: ‘na paralokaṁ upādiyissāmi, na ca me paralokanissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:14.5_0: ‘yampi me diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anupariyesitaṁ anucaritaṁ manasā tampi na upādiyissāmi,
mn143:14.5_1: na ca me tannissitaṁ viññāṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:15.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati parodi, assūni pavattesi.
mn143:15.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ etadavoca:
mn143:15.3_0: “olīyasi kho tvaṁ, gahapati, saṁsīdasi kho tvaṁ, gahapatī”ti?
mn143:15.5_0: api ca me dīgharattaṁ satthā payirupāsito manobhāvanīyā ca bhikkhū;
mn143:15.6_0: na ca me evarūpī dhammī kathā sutapubbā”ti.
mn143:15.7_0: “Na kho, gahapati, gihīnaṁ odātavasanānaṁ evarūpī dhammī kathā paṭibhāti;
mn143:15.8_0: pabbajitānaṁ kho, gahapati, evarūpī dhammī kathā paṭibhātī”ti.
mn143:15.9_0: “Tena hi, bhante sāriputta, gihīnampi odātavasanānaṁ evarūpī dhammī kathā paṭibhātu.
mn143:15.10_0: Santi hi, bhante, kulaputtā apparajakkhajātikā, assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti;
mn143:16.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca ānando anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ iminā ovādena ovaditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṁsu.
mn143:16.2_1: acirapakkante āyasmante ca sāriputte āyasmante ca ānande,
mn143:17.1_0: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn143:17.2_0: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto bhagavantaṁ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
mn143:18.4_0: “samanuñño me satthā”ti bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
mn143:19.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn143:19.2_2: rattiṁ aññataro devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
mn143:19.3_0: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho so devaputto maṁ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
mn143:19.21_0: ‘Samanuñño me satthā’ti maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
mn143:20.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn143:20.2_0: “so hi nūna so, bhante, anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto bhavissati.
mn143:20.3_0: Anāthapiṇḍiko, bhante, gahapati āyasmante sāriputte abhippasanno ahosī”ti.
mn143:20.5_0: Yāvatakaṁ kho, ānanda, takkāya pattabbaṁ, anuppattaṁ taṁ tayā.
mn143:20.8_0: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
